price: Dan istrinya berdiri (di balik tirai), lalu dia tersenyum, maka Kami sampaikan kepadanya berita gembira tentang (kelahiran) Isḥāq dan dari Isḥāq (akan lahir putranya) Ya`qūb.
arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-im'ra-atuhu qāimatun faḍaḥikat fabasharnāhā bi-is'ḥāqa wamin warāi is'ḥāqa yaʿqūba
translations: Then We gave her glad tidings
